item.title: Expert Group on Business Registers, 27-29 September 2017, OECD, Paris
item.description:
The upcoming ‘Meeting of the Expert Group on Business Registers’ will take place from 27-29 September at the OECD in Paris. The program of the meeting is available on the UNECE’s homepage.

The contribution that I wrote together with my colleagues Sara Thijs, Peter Neudorfer and Sandrine Corvoisier is included in the part about ‘Registers and globalisation’ and is available here. The accompanying presentation is available here.
